関連科目: Students can learn all of the material with no prior background in finance, accounting, or Excel.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover, among other topics, early-stage businesses and their critical finance decisions, compounding, time value of money, investment basics, valuation, equity markets, debt markets, Modern Finance, investment banking, asset management, and finance and capital markets career opportunities.
授業方法:
Students drive the class. Hands-on practice (on paper/Excel spreadsheets), class discussions, readings, case study, videos, podcasts, real-life examples, Power Point slides, and student presentations
Hy-Flex (We meet in a classroom and provide this course "Face-to Face" as well as in "Zoom.")
